| History                 = The Royal Cobras were NY City's top Vietnamese gang, which were being pushed around by the Savage Tigers, the American branch of the [[White Lotus Society (Earth-616)|White Lotus Society]]. Needing help against the Savage Tigers, the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] formed a temporary alliance with them.  After which they attacked the Triad warehouse, defeating their enemies.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 51}}
